title: Microsoft encarta '95 (PC)
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Children's encyclopedias and dictionaries
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: An interactive learning resource with text of the Funk & Wagnalls New Encyclopedia, sound, images, animation, video clips, maps, interactive charts, timeline, atlas and knowledge adventure game, also includes interactive tour of Encarta called Mind-maze. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or PC compatible with 386SX or higher processor; audio board; SVGA resolution monitor with 256 colours or higher; 4Mb of RAM; at least 3.5Mb of available disk space; Microsoft Windows 3.1; MS-DOS 3.1 or later.
